meta.title: scorekarte.ch – Golf Handicap Calculator & Scorecard Tools
meta.description: Calculate your golf handicap, create scorecards and use the Stableford calculator. Free online tools for Swiss golfers.
meta.ogDescription: Free golf tools: HCP calculator, scorecard, Stableford points. Optimized for Swiss golf courses.

hero.title: scorekarte.ch
hero.subtitle: Your digital caddy for handicap calculations

hcp.title: HCP Calculator
hcp.subtitle: Calculate your playing handicap (Course Handicap) for any course
hcp.tooltipDesc: Number of handicap strokes for a specific course.
hcp.tooltipCR: Course Rating: Expected strokes of a scratch golfer
hcp.tooltipPar: Par: Standard score of the course
hcp.nineHoleTooltip: Enable for 9-hole rounds. Enter Course Rating and Par as 9-hole values.

scorecard.title: Scorecard
scorecard.subtitle: Record your strokes and calculate the Score Differential
scorecard.inputModeTotal: Total strokes: One field – simply enter the sum of all strokes.
scorecard.inputModeHole: Hole by hole: 18 fields – enter strokes played for each hole.
scorecard.ndbTooltipDesc: Maximum scoreable result per hole for handicap purposes.
scorecard.ndbTooltipUsage: For struck holes or when actual score was higher than NDB.
scorecard.confirmResetAll: Do you really want to reset all inputs?

stableford.title: Stableford Calculator
stableford.subtitle: Calculate your Stableford points for each hole

vorgaben.title: Handicap Calculator
vorgaben.subtitle: Calculate handicap strokes per hole based on your playing handicap
vorgaben.explanation: Handicap strokes are distributed across holes, starting with the lowest Stroke Index.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Enter the Slope Rating, Course Rating and Par of your golf course.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Enter your strokes – as a total or hole by hole.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Instantly get your Score Differential and Stableford points.

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.description: We use cookies to provide you with the best possible experience. Some are necessary, others help us improve the website.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors use the website.
